sense.name: make safe
sense.examples: Online music will be safeguarded by on-chip security. How will my offers be safeguarded by the Global Hand process? Information to be safeguarded includes names and addresses of applicants, recipients, and their relatives. In Bohemia he safeguarded the rights of the Church against the encroachments of King Ottocar. He safeguarded the royal dignity by bringing them in at the back door of the palace.

sense.name: escort safely
sense.examples: Aterui and More were captured by Tamuramaro Sakanoue who safeguarded them to the Chotei in Kyoto. It was his duty to safeguard her to Master Yong. I promised your child I would safeguard her home.
